thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SI Financial Group Declares Cash Dividend Of $0.06 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SI Financial Group Declares Cash Dividend Of $0.06 Per Share
text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - SI Financial Group Inc:
* SI FINANCIAL GROUP, INC. INCREASES WAGES AND DIVIDEND * SI FINANCIAL GROUP -DECLARED CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.06 PER SHARE ON CO‘S OUTSTANDING SHARES OF COMMON STOCK, REPRESENTING 20% INCREASE OVER PRIOR QUARTER​
* SI FINANCIAL GROUP INC - PLANS TO RAISE MINIMUM WAGES FOR ABOUT 25% OF BANK‘S WORKFORCE AS A RESULT OF ENACTMENT OF NEW FEDERAL TAX REFORM LEGISLATION
* SI FINANCIAL GROUP INC - BOARD DECLARED A CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.06 PER SHARE ON OUTSTANDING SHARES OF STOCK, REPRESENTING A 20% INCREASE OVER PRIOR QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
